queries.description: Redefinition of keywords is confusing and in the case where the standard library is included where that keyword is defined, the redefinition will result in undefined behaviour.
queries.name: A macro shall not be defined with the same name as a keyword

RULE-20-4.title: A macro shall not be defined with the same name as a keyword

queries.description: Arguments to a function-like macro shall not contain tokens that look like pre-processing directives or else behaviour after macro expansion is unpredictable.
queries.name: Tokens that look like a preprocessing directive shall not occur within a macro argument

RULE-20-6.title: Tokens that look like a preprocessing directive shall not occur within a macro argument

queries.description: The use of #define and #undef on reserved identifiers or macro names can result in undefined behaviour.
queries.name: #define and #undef shall not be used on a reserved identifier or reserved macro name

RULE-21-1.title: #define and #undef shall not be used on a reserved identifier or reserved macro name
